item.title: Pointers
item.description: I see many people getting confused regarding pointers and over time I have noticed some common areas people get confused, so I decided to write a post explaining some of these areas. The Theory behind Pointers Some background definitions Lifetimes A lifetime describes when a variable is first given space in the program’s memory and when that memory will be released. The Stack The stack is the most important area of memory.
